subject: Re: [junit] Trouble with my Ant build integration
msgSnippet: ... You are specifying a test in the default package here. ... Ant is trying to tell you don t do that. Put your tests in a package of some kind. -- J. B.
messageBody:
thomascrownxoxo wrote:

> <test name="ListImplTest" todir="${test.reports.dir} "/>

You are specifying a test in the default package here.

> Will not load classes from default package
> java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Will not load classes from default
> package

Ant is trying to tell you "don't do that." Put your tests in a package
of some kind.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
